pages.text: Volcanic Fumarole generates in desert and mountains. Some are active with lava, some are cooling with magma block, the others would be inactive with obsidian.

Volcanic Fumarole contains a vent in the middle, if two blocks below it is lava, it would become active, causing entity fire and generate pumice bloom in nearby water. If it is magma block, it would not generate pumice bloom.
Mining pumice bloom yields pumice, an important building material. Pick it with silk touch to get pumice bloom.

Active or cooling vents are free heat source, can provide heat at a lower speed. But if $(l:tweaks/water_interaction)water$(/l) goes in the vent, it would neither provide heat nor generate pumice bloom.
